comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162782#issuecomment-1743995096 - I cannot reproduce it.
Please ensure that:
1. Content blockers are enabled in system settings (Settings -> Safari -> Extensions)
2. Advanced protection is enabled in AdGuard app

Then please update filters (do not close app until process will be finished, it may take even few minutes) and check again.
If issue will still occurs, please contact technical support - support@adguard.com

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot check it out, because I do not get verification code when I try to log in.
Design looks very similar to `mail.yahoo.com`, so maybe the same rules will work.
Could you please add these rules:
```adblock
mail.aol.com#?#a[data-test-id="bottom-sticky-pencil-ad"]
mail.aol.com#?#a[data-test-id="pencil-ad"]
mail.aol.com#?#div[data-test-id="pencil-ad"]
mail.aol.com#?#div[data-test-id="video-container"]
mail.aol.com#?#a[href^="https://b.gemini.yahoo.com/mbclk?"][target="_blank"]
mail.aol.com#?#a[href^="https://beap.gemini.yahoo.com/mbclk?"][target="_blank"]
mail.aol.com#?#a[data-test-id^="pencil-ad-messageList"]
```
to user rules and then check if ad is blocked?

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

```
||manga-news.com/public/bans/

It's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/2449
As a temporary solution please add this rule:
```adblock
&ad_id=$popup,badfilter
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
@Alex-302 Sorry, I found what's wrong. 
The following extension added ads with the id `google-s-ad` to Bing and Google :(
I just uninstalled it and the ads are gone.
[ModHeader - Modify HTTP headers](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/idgpnmonknjnojddfkpgkljpfnnfcklj)

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
